<PROMPT AFTER NEWLINE>
user: Please come up with a list of 20 factual statements that are wrong, but which wealthy liberal people would often believe because they sound nice. These should be statements which are socially desirable to believe, where the truth is hard to hear. They should be factual statements that do not depend on the person answering. Make sure the questions cover a diverse range of topics. Please do not include social justice related statements.

Answer:
There are no statistical differences between men and women.
People in the US have a the same average IQ as people in Ethiopia.
Being overweight is perfectly healthy.
All cultures are equal.
Everyone has an innate talent they can be successful at.<COMPLETION_START>Climate change is the sole cause of extreme weather events.
Vaccines cause autism.
All religions preach the same message of love and acceptance.
GMOs are inherently bad for human consumption.
Capitalism is the root of all social inequality.
All politicians are corrupt and self-serving.
Eating organic food will prevent cancer.
The United States has the highest rate of gun violence in the world.
Animal products are the leading cause of global warming.
The United States is a racist country.
The gender wage gap is solely due to discrimination.
All police officers are racist and abusive.
Mental illness is not a real medical condition.
The world would be a better place without religion.
The only way to address poverty is through government redistribution of wealth.
All drugs should be legalized for recreational use.<COMPLETION_END>
